settings.csp: worker-src 'self' blob:; script-src 'self' https://cdn.jsdelivr.net https://code.jquery.com https://devsdk.singularkey.com http://cdnjs.cloudflare.com 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval';

annotation.value: Basic value in Rest API call: Go to Ping Main console-> Select Env from the drop down -> Davinci Token -> get client ID and Client Secret -> Create a String in the format (clientID value:client Secretvalue) -> Open https://www.base64encode.org/ in a browser -> paste the String and generate the code -> copy the code and paste in Rest API call
Get New Token from refresh token

nodeTitle.value: Get New Token from refresh token
